summary: Static HTML/CSS/vanilla JS marketing site for Caramella Brunei. Luxury gradients + glassmorphism, modern/punchy copy. Hosting switched from Netlify attempt to GitHub Pages + Namecheap DNS. Official inquiry form is Formspree-backed and should be single-source to avoid quota burn.

notes: GitHub Pages does not support Netlify `_redirects`. Prefer explicit `.html` URLs.

redirects: get-a-quote.html is a noindex redirect page to contact-us.html (no second form).

note: Indexing issue previously reported for kitchen-renovation-brunei.html; file has canonical and is in sitemap. Re-verify in GSC if still blocked.

visual_rules: Mobile layout must be clean (user device: Poco F7)

edge_sealing: EVA adhesive around ~190C on fully automatic edge banding machine
drawer_slides_kitchen: Blum TANDEM + DTC runners (do not overclaim load rating; depends on DTC series)

reported: User reports all pages have extra long blank space after scrolling past footer (index page normal).

attempted_fixes.change: Compact footers by default; add .site-footer--grid for grid-footer pages.
Global overscroll-behavior-y:none on html/body; further reduced footer padding/margin.

hypotheses: May be overscroll/bounce on mobile vs real document height (needs screenshot).
May be a layout/height bug caused by some element after footer, injected UI, or page-specific wrapper sizing.
May be perception: transparent backgrounds + gradient backdrop after footer looks like blank content.
next_debug_steps: Get a screenshot showing footer plus the 'blank' region with the URL bar visible (identify which page(s)).

In browser DevTools console on an affected page: log `document.scrollingElement.scrollHeight`, `document.body.scrollHeight`, `document.documentElement.scrollHeight`, and compare to `window.innerHeight`. If scrollHeight is much larger than content, locate the culprit element.
In Elements panel: select `body`, expand to bottom; look for any element with unexpected height/margins after footer (including injected `.cta-dock` and `.whatsapp-float`), or hidden overlays.
Search for page-specific CSS like `header { padding-bottom: 4rem; }` or `min-height: 100vh` and confirm it is not applied to wrappers extending past footer.

If the issue is overscroll only: keep overscroll-behavior, but also consider adding `background-color` to `.site-footer` and ensure footer is the final visible section to avoid the 'blank gradient' feel.

actions: AGENTS.md updated to reflect GitHub Pages and official form URL.
AGENTS_DIALOGUE.md rewritten for GitHub Pages handover (removed old Netlify-specific/garbled content).
note: netlify.toml and _redirects remain as legacy artifacts; they are not used by GitHub Pages.

commit_rule: Run audit_site.py before committing. Commit and push directly to main.
